name: Clean Room 101
description: Deep cleaning of deluxe room after checkout
notes: Room cleaned and restocked. AC filter replaced.

name: Fix Bathroom Faucet
description: Leaking faucet in room 205 bathroom sink
notes: Ordered replacement parts. Will complete once parts arrive.

name: Guest Welcome Amenities
description: Prepare VIP amenity package for arriving guest
notes: VIP guest arriving at 3 PM. Include champagne and flowers.

name: Inspect Fire Safety Equipment
description: Monthly inspection of smoke detectors and fire extinguishers
notes: All equipment functioning properly. Updated inspection log.

name: Replace Light Bulbs
description: Several burned out bulbs in room 303 need replacement
notes: Guest reported dim lighting. Check all fixtures.

name: Laundry Service Pickup
description: Collect and process guest laundry from room 407
notes: Express service requested. Return by 6 PM today.

name: Clean Lobby Area
description: Daily deep cleaning of main lobby and seating areas
notes: Vacuumed carpets, cleaned windows, polished furniture.

name: Repair Air Conditioning
description: AC unit not cooling properly in room 502
notes: Guest complaint. Priority repair needed before evening.

name: Stock Mini Bar
description: Restock mini bar in premium suite
notes: Refreshed all beverages and snacks. Checked expiration dates.

name: Update Room Status
description: Mark rooms as ready for occupancy after cleaning
notes: Update system for rooms 101, 203, 305 after final inspection.

name: Maintenance Check
description: Weekly maintenance inspection of all guest rooms
notes: Comprehensive check of plumbing, electrical, and HVAC systems.

name: Guest Room Setup
description: Special room arrangement for anniversary celebration
notes: Arranged rose petals, champagne, and anniversary card as requested.

name: Pool Maintenance
description: Daily chemical balance and cleaning of swimming pool
notes: Adjusted pH levels, cleaned filters, tested water quality.

name: Lost and Found Processing
description: Process and catalog items left by departing guests
notes: Items from rooms 102, 304, 506. Contact guests if valuable items.

name: Security System Check
description: Test door locks and security cameras on third floor
notes: Routine security check. Verify all access points secure.
